column3: â€œI love this stuff. Just found it through a local delivery service in SW Washington state (yes possession is legal here now but you still have to be medical to legally obtain it - don't say buy - buying is still illegal). I have generalized anxiety disorder. I'm naturally the kind of person that freaks out after one cup of coffee. For me this is almost as good as xanax. I have a prescription for xanax and also a presc...â€

â€œI live in sac town and I remember when this strain started hitting dispensaries here around 2009 or so. Alot of ppl aren't sure what strains were crossed to make this beautiful plant. I have a good friend whose been growing for over 25 yrs, an old OG hippie. I wanted him to prove to me that purple cream really was (purple urkle x GDP x purple urkle), so he grew it and sure enough it had the same look,smell, taste, an...â€

â€œPurple Cream was picked by my sister and she seemed pretty excited for it for whatever her reasons were. It is a dense and floral looking strain, that is dark green and purple. The nugs are cured well and smell terrific, of dark spices and skunkiness. It smokes quickly as it is dense and brittle, and provides a thick and somewhat harsh smoke. Cough-producing. The smoke tastes a lot like licorice and nutmeg to me.. it...â€

â€œThis is my First encounter with the wonderful strain Purple Cream. I was a tad skeptical at first, due to the name. The buds are so aesthetically pleasing its almost unreal. Large Medium-Dense Crystal Coated Light Green and Purple Buds made up the QP I purchased. There's more purple than green. The flavour is very mellow and sweet, with the slightest hint of Candy or a purple Popsicle in there. Excellent when looking...â€
â€œGreat smelling, good price, great service!â€
â€œgood after a workout, leaves you feeling sedative and happyâ€
â€œpretty good indica right here makes everything around you better!â€

â€œI recently bought a hydroponic grown harvest of this bud and it is legendary purple. The nugs are purple, crystally, dense, and the taste is amazing. This is what a real indica high should be like all the time.â€
â€œgood after a workout, leaves you feeling sedative and happyâ€

â€œPerfect indica for before bed. Made me really tired, relaxed, and hungry. Has a pretty carefree and happy high, definitely thoughtful. It can feel like a punch, buts its good after after a long stressful day when you want to laze about and relax.â€
â€œpretty good indica right here makes everything around you better!â€
â€œBought some of this right after I got my card, and it was a pretty amazing experience. Has a fruity smell and taste, and made me hella happy.â€

â€œBest I've had in recent history. Does make you a little tired and unmotivated, but if you can kick it in it can be worked on. Helped my anxiety and back pain. My dad really liked this one and it reminded him of stuff he had as a kid.â€
â€œVery lazy and relaxing but not euphoric. It's a solid one-note strain... I deal with a fair amount of anxiety, so Purple Cream is great if I all I want to do is watch a movie and go to bed.â€

â€œFirst time using Purple Creme. Am trading my usual nighttime indica (GDP) for this - and so far I am liking it - but not sure I want to give up GDP permanently, I'm thinking I will alternate them. I come away with a creamy high from this, which is nothing to complain about.â€
â€œ5-Stars! Vape this at bedtime (or when you can't sleep) and 15 minutes later it's a freight train to the face filled with relaxation and sleepiness. Choo-choo!!!â€
â€œ5-Stars! Vape this at bedtime (or when you can't sleep) and 15 minutes later it's a freight train to the face filled with relaxation and sleepiness. Choo-choo!!!â€

â€œBest I've had in recent history. Does make you a little tired and unmotivated, but if you can kick it in it can be worked on. Helped my anxiety and back pain. My dad really liked this one and it reminded him of stuff he had as a kid.â€
â€œVery lazy and relaxing but not euphoric. It's a solid one-note strain... I deal with a fair amount of anxiety, so Purple Cream is great if I all I want to do is watch a movie and go to bed.â€
â€œNice relaxing high. Very mild body high that creeps up. Great for sleep, would recommend for anyone needing help sleeping.â€

â€œWhile I'm not typically a fan of Indicas, this Purple Cream is something else. Super mellow, happy high with a nice and strong but not overpowering body high. The aroma and flavour are phenomenal: sweet, earthy, and creamy rich flavour without being too intense. Perfect way to relax and unwind after a long stressful day.â€

â€œHelped with anxiety and pain. Dad really liked it and it reminded him of stuff he smoked when he was a kid in the 70's and early 80's. Good taste. It's a tightly packed nuggets and is brittle and sticky. Really dark colored weed. I loved it and would buy again. Down side is it does have a couch lock, but with a little umph, you can get it done.â€

â€œRight when I picked this bad boy up I knew it was some fire ass dank. First bowl had feeling that indica feeling which gets stronger as you continue to sesh creating a lazy feeling and calming affect. It's a really beautiful high I would recommend this you want a nice good rest.â€
â€œIt makes me feel as if I'm floating on top of the clouds. Love it. Im usually picky when it comes to certain strains I will smoke but this one is defs a good choice. So relaxing.â€
â€œTerrible strain for me. Gives me a headache. I'm barely stoned but just more aware of things that are kind of unpleasant (like my allergies). Bad bad pie!â€

â€œGreat smoke.  I had never heard of this before i picked it up.  After researching a bit and making the order i was happy that i did.  Smells amazing before the burn. smells amazing after the burn.

High is nice and mellow, not overly chair locked but could catch some Zzzz's if i wanted. Definitely check this out if you canâ€

â€œFrom the first inhale to the last, each hit was felt through out my body. I felt each level of high up to where I wanted to be. The come down always put me to sleep like if I had just ran for miles all day long. 
LOVED IT! 
Anything with purple" in it is always amazing.
â€œBest strain when you can't sleep.â€

â€œPurple cream is definitely perfect for falling asleep, and not the best for daytime. 
I find this strain often gives me headaches, but I always get a good sleep after smoking it.â€
â€œthis is such a beautiful indica, very strong smell but it gives you such a calm body high. I just want to gaze at the moon whenever I smoke purple creamâ€

â€œApproached this strain with caution due to me being primarily a fan of daytime upbeat Sativas but this right here vibed very well with me! I could even see using this for chill days. Overall smooth yet fully functional, clear headed and actually relatively up for having fun, watching a movie, reading etc. Tight purple nugs covered in crystals and a piney smell. Delightful.â€

â€œThis is the smoothest strain I have ever had.  Perfect strain for people with stomach and lung problems who don't want to cough. I feel less pressure on my slipped disc when I medicate with purple cream and relax into a stress free mood.â€
â€œIt gave me a bit of a body high. Nice to smoke and even good to fool around after a bowl. Keeping this for more Netflix and chill stash.â€

â€œWhile I'm not typically a big fan of Indicas, this Purple Cream is something else. Super mellow, happy high with a nice and strong but not overpowering body high. Perfect way to relax after a long and stressful day.â€

â€œMy favorite Indica, no joke. Gonna have to travel a bit to get more of it - my local dispensary is out! Purple Cream puts you to sleep, shuts the mind off, and puts your body at ease. Not to mention the smell and taste.. It's amazing.â€

â€œI'm a sucker for anything with Purple in its name. Suffering from Insomnia, loss of appetite, muscle aches and a plethora of other health issues. This Magnificent strain has been a godsent. The look is Frosty witg hues of purple green and white. The flavor profile is that of Purple (If that makes sense) with a soft creaminess of ice cream. The exhale is smooth like Buttahhh. This baby packs a punch, even for experien...â€

â€œThis strain smells very good, literally creamy. I took a bowl once and it gave me one of the worst highs in my life. I was extremely paranoid and felt like I was just locked to the bed lol. â€œDefinitely a very good Indica, I suffer from Severe anxiety and depression and I have to say this buddah made all my worries and nerves go away! Definitely a night time bud as it can easily put you to sleep.â€
